My Works

I build software that gets the job done. Below are some of my projects, showcasing tools and applications built with technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Bun, Docker, Rust, Go, and web frameworks.

Featured Work

WhatsApp Bot

A fast tool for sending, receiving, and processing WhatsApp events, built with Node.js and TypeScript.

Automation Scripts

Collection of scripts for streamlining tasks, using Bun and JavaScript for high performance automation workflows.

Containerized API

A scalable REST API deployed with Docker, written in Go for maximum efficiency and performance.

XstroGolang

A powerful WhatsApp client implementation written in Go, providing robust messaging capabilities and real-time communication.

GoCurl

A lightweight HTTP client library for Go, designed for simplicity and performance in making web requests and API calls.

Dev Tools Suite

A collection of developer utilities and tools built with TypeScript, focusing on productivity and code quality improvements.
